div.head: 大便結
div.div: major relief bound; bound stools; constipation

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief bound; bound stools; constipation

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da bian mi 大便秘① , constipation. Pu ji fang 普濟方 135 Recipe Entry po jie dan 破 結丹 , elixir to break through knottings: 大便結，攻之不及，達之不可，以此 主之 , “In the case of bound defecation where attacks remain unsuccessful, and that cannot be reached, resorting to this [medication] will control it”.
